name: Story of Ramayana
description: The Ramayana was an important influence on later Sanskrit poetry and Hindu life and culture. The characters  Sita, Hanuman, and Ravana are all fundamental to the cultural consciousness of the Asian nations of Indonesia, India, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Thailand. Its most important moral influence was the importance of virtue, in the life of a citizen and in the ideals of the formation of a state or of a functioning society.
